General.Name: Zhejiang Xinchai Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Xinchai Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of multi-cylinder diesel engines in China. Its products are used in construction machinery, agricultural machinery, generator sets, forklifts, and other industries. The company also exports its products to the Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Europe, the United States, Africa, and internationally. Zhejiang Xinchai Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Xinchang, China.
General.Address: No.888 The West Road, Xinchang, China, 312500
